Buttons

  • Regular
  • Colorizing
  • Text + Icon
  • Compound
  • Dashed

Regular Button

Default The class sui-button determines the base markup for any button that contains text. 
<button role="button" class="sui-button">Button</button>
Outlined This variation can come with border only and transparent background. For those cases you can make use of sui-button-ghost class. 
<button role="button" class="sui-button sui-button-ghost">Button</button>
Disabled As simple as it sounds, you can add disabled attribute to button element or disabled class if you are using link element. 
<button role="button" class="sui-button" disabled>Button</button>
<a role="button" class="sui-button disabled">Button</a>
Large There are some cases when you gonna need to make use of bigger buttons, to achieve this you can add sui-button-lg class. 
<button role="button" class="sui-button sui-button-lg">Button</button>

Colorize Buttons

There are some cases when you gonna need buttons with specific colors, to achieve this you can add sui-button-{color_name} extra class.

To try each button color variation click on the options below:

Blue
Green
Red
Orange
Yellow
Purple
Default 
<button role="button" class="sui-button sui-button-blue">Button</button>
Outlined 
<button role="button" class="sui-button sui-button-ghost sui-button-blue">Button</button>
Disabled 
<button role="button" class="sui-button sui-button-blue" disabled>Button</button>
<button role="button" class="sui-button sui-button-ghost sui-button-blue" disabled>Button</button>
Large 
<button role="button" class="sui-button sui-button-blue sui-button-lg">Button</button>
Default 
<button role="button" class="sui-button sui-button-green">Button</button>
Outlined 
<button role="button" class="sui-button sui-button-ghost sui-button-green">Button</button>
Disabled

<button role="button" class="sui-button sui-button-ghost sui-button-green" disabled>Button</button>
Large 
<button role="button" class="sui-button sui-button-green sui-button-lg">Button</button>
